entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the twins who pushed their way to the front of the crowd and scolded Ron. ("Fred and George pushed their way to the front of the crowd and said together, ‘Why couldn’t you’ve called us back, eh?’")

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the twins who pushed their way to the front of the crowd and scolded Ron. ("Fred and George pushed their way to the front of the crowd and said together, ‘Why couldn’t you’ve called us back, eh?’")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being scolded by Fred and George. He is described as being scarlet in the face and grinning embarrassedly. ("Ron was scarlet in the face, grinning embarrassedly , but Harry")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being present at the scene where Ron is being scolded by Fred and George. ("but Harry")

relationships.description: Fred scolded Ron for not calling him back. ("Why couldn’t you’ve called us back, eh?’")
George also scolded Ron for not calling him back. ("Why couldn’t you’ve called us back, eh?’")
